term.title: hypo-phase

item.text: The denser phase in an extraction system. This term is often used when two non-aqueous phases are present or when the solvent is an aqueous phase.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2373. 'Nomenclature for liquid-liquid distribution (solvent extraction) (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2381 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365112373)
